thread.title: Female runner, 52, dies after running 10km event in Hong Kong marathon
thread.title_full: Female runner, 52, dies after running 10km event in Hong Kong marathon

author: Rachel Blundy
title: Female runner, 52, dies after running 10km event in Hong Kong marathon
text:
Female runner, 52, dies after running 10km event in Hong Kong marathon PUBLISHED : Monday, 13 February, 2017, 4:48pm UPDATED : Monday, 13 February, 2017, 4:48pm Ethiopian breaks course record in Hong Kong Marathon 12 Feb 2017 
A 52-year-old runner has died after competing in the 10km event at this yearâ€™s Standard Chartered Hong Kong Marathon. 
The woman was left fighting for her life after collapsing on the course on Sunday morning. 
She was initially taken to Ruttonjee Hospital in Wan Chai but was transferred to Pamela Youde Nethersole Eastern Hospital, where she died at 3.41pm on Monday, the Hospital Authority said.
